rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0001
rows.name: Friend...knows about Nopon people?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0002
rows.name:
Yes, yes, of course!
Nopon purchase my wares quite often, you know.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0003
rows.name: They're excellent... How should I say? "Suckers"?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0004
rows.name: Uh...I think you mean "customers."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0005
rows.name: So Mr. L, you've lived here a long time?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0006
rows.name: Just "L"—and yes. Such a nice, quiet world.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0007
rows.name:
The wildlife and insects are all so docile—
such gentle dispositions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: xs04070100_SEL0011
rows.name: Concur the wildlife is peaceful.

rows.label: xs04070100_JNK0020
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: xs04070100_SEL0021
rows.name: Claim the wildlife is hostile.

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0008
rows.name: Are you kidding me?! They attack us all the time![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0009
rows.name: Indeed![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0010
rows.name:
Yes, friends lucky Tatsu here to protect them
from becoming main course.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0011
rows.name:
Yeah, 'cuz we can toss you out as an appetizer
and run away while they're snacking.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0012
rows.name: Well, the creatures here are hungry, yes. Granted.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0013
rows.name: "Gentle disposition" my butt.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0014
rows.name: It's just...hmmm...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0015
rows.name: What?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0016
rows.name:
Well, who can blame them,
with all the commotion here as of late?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0017
rows.name:
Not that we're pointing our fingers at you, mind.
No, it's those Prone. Sons of bastards.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0018
rows.name: Yeah, we're not their biggest fans either.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0019
rows.name: We loathe them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0019_2
rows.name: They have ruined our once-peaceful life here. RUINED![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0020
rows.name: They are all...how should we say? Asscaves.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0021
rows.name:
Close enough. By the way, L,
you seem to speak our language quite fluently.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0022
rows.name: Well...yeah. Most of the time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0023
rows.name:
We owe it all to that wreckage back there—
what a treasure trove![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0024
rows.name: Especially the data terminal we found inside.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0025
rows.name:
It is the ultimate portable snack
for satisfying our insatiable curiosity![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0026
rows.name:
"Wreckage back there"... 
You think that's our piece of the Lifehold?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0027
rows.name: Certainly sounds like it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0027_2
rows.name: L, can we take a look at this terminal you found?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0028
rows.name: Of course, of course.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0029
rows.name: Thanks. Lin, see what you can make of it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0030
rows.name: On it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0031
rows.name: Okay...yep. This is library data.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0032
rows.name: Let me see.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0033
rows.name:
Huh. So it is. The unit L stumbled upon
must be part of the Lifehold's Archives.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0034
rows.name: So...not the Core, then.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0035
rows.name: The entire ship was torn to bits when we came down.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0036
rows.name:
The odds of any single piece of Lifehold
being the Core aren't very high.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0037
rows.name: Yeah, I guess not...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0038
rows.name: Now, now, Lin, don't be glum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0039
rows.name:
The Lifehold Archives are the sum total
of all human knowledge—this is still a really big find.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0040
rows.name: We should try and secure it ASAP.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0041
rows.name: Yeah, you're right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0042
rows.name: Now...might not be a good time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0043
rows.name: Why not?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0044
rows.name: Why else? ...The Asscaves![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0045
rows.name:
We just came from there,
and Prone are all over the wreckage...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0046
rows.name: What?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0047
rows.name: Uh-oh... This is bad.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0048
rows.name: Very bad—let's go.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0049
rows.name:
Apologies we didn't mention it before—
we assumed you'd abandoned it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0050
rows.name:
Allow us to show you the way. After all, as you say—
too many heads are better than none, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04070100_MSG0051
rows.name: Uh...close enough.[ST:wait ]
